channel.title: Bullshit? teachers suck dick
channel.description:
UPDATE: Teacher handed it back with a 75% grade. douchebag.
Alright, in school you couldn't exactly call me the "hardest" working kid. I do what I am told in school, but aren't interested in exceeding the standard, and my teachers are stereotypical bastards. Because I wear striped sweatshirts, have long hair, and wear straight leg jeans I am a "punk" who is a dillweed.
Yesterday we had a big history report due, and I have a very low history average (77%) and decided to go "Above the standard" for once. I wrote a story of a civil war wife and a report on Ulysees Grant. I walk into school today to be immediately called out by our principal, greeted with "Mr.Ross, how much exactly did you plagiarize on your history report?". Are you fucking kidding me?. My history teacher had went to my principal and accused me of plagiarism. You could say he hates me for no reason, because apparently I am a "punk". It wasn't the accusation that pissed me off as much as his reason. Quote reason for accusing me of plagiarism: "Andrew does not use this normal vocabulary, and he would never use any of these words." He instructed us to use a wide vocabulary and vocabulary journalists in the 1800's would use. The principal kept telling me things like I was going to fess up and be like , "okay, maybe i plagiarized a little." She even told me how the school has a "system to detect plagiarism." Yeah about that.. google.com plagiarism.org
bullshit please?

item.title: Bullshit? teachers suck dick

item.description:
@PeterMan wrote:

Probably safe somewhere to protect it from plagiarism.

More like 4-5 seconds.
[/quote]
Really depends on the importance of the article…[/quote]

They have vandalism detection bots. As well as 999999 mods checking the edit summeries.

Hate to be immature, but I deleted a really unimportant article right now and it was back instantly. Damn you cluebot.

And–[quote=“Andrew, post:1, topic:264307”]She even told me how the school has a “system to detect plagiarism.”
Yeah about that…
google.com

plagiarism.org

Home - Plagiarism.org

Plagiarism is a common (and often misunderstood) problem that is often the result of a lack of knowledge and skills. Our mission is to support the education community with a comprehensive set of resources to help students write with integrity.

bullshit please?[/quote]My teacher said the same thing, and i responded with “Google?”

She didn’t say anything else, 3 days went by and i got my paper back with an A on it.

item.title: Bullshit? teachers suck dick
item.dc:creator: @PeterMan PeterMan
item.description:
@PeterMan wrote:

Javac Batch:

Teachers are bitches. One called my house because I didn’t hand in an assignment that I had no idea about (was sick) and doesn’t confront me about it. Period 4: I walk into her classroom and all of a sudden she’s like “Oh, I called your mom” I was like “why, what’d you say…?” with an attitude and she snapped. I was pissing myself laughing.

What kind of attitude? The “I think you called my mom because you think she is a MILF” attitude?.. if so…

EPIC WIN

Read full topic

item.title: Bullshit? teachers suck dick
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

It’s a simple website, and the most basic one is turnitin.com I think.

That one has a database of every research paper uploaded to it, and a shit ton of book, newpaper, magazine, etc references also.

It tells the teacher the percentage plagiarized (what a weird ass word) (almost every paper has a percentage <40), where it’s from, and highlights it with a color that is used as a key to where it was plagiarized from.

It usually gets serious when there’s a high amount of “plagiarism” and nothing is being cited to (AKA actual plagiarism).
And of course, every paper will have a percentage >0. Otherwise, the paper is probably shit grammar-wise.

Read full topic

item.title: Bullshit? teachers suck dick
item.dc:creator: @PeterMan PeterMan
item.description:
@PeterMan wrote:

This happened to me aswell.

Bitch couldn’t prove shit. But instead of she going to the principal, I did. So I got my grade and she got a warning from the principal to check before making accusations like that.

And also…
Sue them for fucking up a possible good future.

Read full topic

item.title: Bullshit? teachers suck dick
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

[quote=“T4_, post:17, topic:264307”][quote author=bowserjr2 link=topic=349043.msg2687294#msg2687294 date=1235753631]

I find it funny they use a search engine to see if people plagiarized.

Is there any other way?
It’s not like google or anything.

There is other ways, some school have programs that can check how much of the text that is copied.
[/quote]

Seems kind of a lame way to check, though. And besides, what if you plagiarized from a hit in search page #100.[/quote]
You would never copied something form search page #100, don’t know how its work, but it don’t looks like our school’s system work since people easy can cheat by stealing 100% of the text from the Internet (The system may have been added after that, I don’t cheat so I don’t really know by my self).

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @cocoa cocoa
item.description:
@cocoa wrote:

Fishstix:

Well it’s not so much the teachers fault, really if you always do shitty all the time then randomly just come out with an A+ report it’d be kind of hard to believe. But really, 77% which is a high C(+) shouldn’t be considerd that bad

Well, unless the teacher can provide solid proof. Then she’s just being a bitch and needs to give him the fucking A. If she still says he plagiarized it the she has to provide evidence or w/e. Maybe she is just trying to get you to stay after school for a good “session”.

item.title: Bullshit? teachers suck dick
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

Well, in my opinion plagiarism is one of those dumb ass rules teachers use to book you if they don’t like you. I’m sure you’re not the only person who has thought of an idea with the same terminology, there’s 6.7Billion+ people on the Earth. I can understand copying an entire journal or something, but a title or possibly one sentence is just plain over-reacting and a false accusation. I find it funny they use a search engine to see if people plagiarized.

Read full topic

item.title: Bullshit? teachers suck dick
item.dc:creator: @Uriko Uriko
item.description:
@Uriko wrote:

[quote=“OnlyOneRule, post:1, topic:264404”][quote author=Andrew link=topic=349043.msg2683619#msg2683619 date=1235525896]
Alright, in school you couldn’t exactly call me the “hardest” working kid. I do what I am told in school, but aren’t interested in exceeding the standard, and my teachers are stereotypical bastards. Because I wear striped sweatshirts, have long hair, and wear straight leg jeans I am a “punk” who is a dillweed.

Yesterday we had a big history report due, and I have a very low history average (77%) and decided to go “Above the standard” for once. I wrote a story of a civil war wife and a report on Ulysees Grant. I walk into school today to be immediately called out by our principal, greeted with “Mr.Ross, how much exactly did you plagiarize on your history report?”. Are you fucking kidding me?. My history teacher had went to my principal and accused me of plagiarism. You could say he hates me for no reason, because apparently I am a “punk”.
It wasn’t the accusation that pissed me off as much as his reason.
Quote reason for accusing me of plagiarism:
“Andrew does not use this normal vocabulary, and he would never use any of these words.”
He instructed us to use a wide vocabulary and vocabulary journalists in the 1800’s would use.
The principal kept telling me things like I was going to fess up and be like , “okay, maybe i plagiarized a little.”
She even told me how the school has a “system to detect plagiarism.”
Yeah about that…
google.com

plagiarism.org

Home - Plagiarism.org

Plagiarism is a common (and often misunderstood) problem that is often the result of a lack of knowledge and skills. Our mission is to support the education community with a comprehensive set of resources to help students write with integrity.

bullshit please?

[/quote]
Quote from one of my mates. (You probobally wont understand)

If your teacher’s a bitch she probs wants to fuck you.

What more can you expect from a woman. They always take things out of proportion and always look for some sort of conspiracy.

Something like this happend to me once. We were in art, the teacher was giving out peices of paper and gave us an hour to draw a self portrait. She had run out of paper just before coming to me. She went to open a new pack of sheets and gave me one. I was the only one to get a sheet from that pack. After a half hour my drawing looked really good and I started the shading. She said there is no way I drew it. She said I brought it to school with me and had obviously copied it from a photograph. She could even prove it by the fact that my paper was a slight different colour and thickness. She made me start over new. I pretty much drew the same again only never got to finish the shading.

I guess that’s why they get women teachers though.[/quote]I would definitely refuse to redo, and I have before.

Read full topic
